body: Worked in social service for 20 years. Councelled and supported women who experienced domestic abuse.Extremely experienced in giving advice on any domestic issue, whether it is verbal or phyicla abuse
After experiencing sexual abuse from an intimite partern for years, I decided to support women through the Women Network network

Certified councelor for verbal and social abuse, 25+ years of professional experience. Worked with over 200 women.
Certified Psychologist specialized on emotional abuse in the workplace
